inlineView.webviewers.name: Containers
inlineView.webviewers.hint: Add like ⋘ [https://foundryvtt.com/api/, Foundry API, fas fa-code], [https://foundryvtt.com, Foundry], [https://dndbeyond.com, DnDBeyond, none, true] ⋙ Font Awesome icons are optional, "none" sets it to default icon. 4th argument is compatibility mode, only use when normal mode doesn't work for the site. 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗺𝗼𝗱𝗲 𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘀 𝗱𝗼𝗺𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝗻𝗮𝗺𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗼 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗮𝗯𝘂𝘀𝗲.
inlineView.useJournal.name: Use journal
inlineView.useJournal.hint: Use a journal instead of the "Containers" setting.
inlineView.webviewColor.name: Background color
inlineView.webviewColor.hint: Changes the color of the webview background
inlineView.webviewColor.label: Choose Color
inlineView.notifications.settingsError: Something is wrong with the webview settings. Check your formatting.
inlineView.journal.name: Journal name
inlineView.journal.hint: Name of the journal if you have journals enabled.
inlineView.html.compatDisclaimer: Compatibility mode logs domain names to prevent proxy abuse.
inlineView.confirmExit.name: Confirm Exit
inlineView.confirmExit.hint: Show a confirmation prompt if you close a viewer window.
inlineView.confirmExit.title: Are you sure?
inlineView.confirmExit.content: Are you sure you want to close this view?
